title: Looking for serif that would go with a Monox friend
content:
I am doing a project for a competition, and it is visual indentity for Mediterranean movies film festival in Split. It is modern, cultural event, with only Mediterranean movies.  
Looking for serif that would go with a Monox by Dino dos Santos.

Also, if you have any other cool monospaced typography feel free to sugest it.

 [‹ Looking for complementary font to Arial for WEB](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/typophile.com/node/49751 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please recommend fonts for magazine body copy ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/typophile.com/node/49740 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ravel

comments.content:
Have you looked at dos Santos’ serifs yet?  
 [Leitura](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura), [Andrade](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/andrade) or the beautiful [Esta](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/esta-pro) for instance.
yeah i looked it. i think of them at first. any other suggestions?
Feijoa looks awfully good in de first example [in this topic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006221423/http:/typophile.com/node/49765).
